DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy Levonorgestrel release Intrauterine System ( Mirena ) Norethisterone Acetate treatment non-atypical endometrial hyperplasia perimenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy LNG-IUS Treatment Non-atypical Endometrial Hyperplasia Perimenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Patients histologically confirmed simple complex endometrial hyperplasia without atypia Endometrial hyperplasia atypia Other pathology e.g . patient fibroids size , genital infection , adnexal abnormality .
